clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Used in the management of symptoms of asthma Also used in the treatment of peripheral vascular diseases and in the management of cerebrovascular insufficiency sickle cell disease and diabetic neuropathy

contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Enprofylline is a synthetic dimethylxanthine derivative structurally related to theophylline and caffeine It antagonizes erythrocyte phosphodiesterase increasing cAMP activity
